messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for SIM count issues.
How to fix the wrong SIM count against my CNIC?
What can I do if my CNIC shows incorrect SIM counts?
Incorrect SIM count on my CNIC, how to correct it?
Kindly contact the networks which are displaying an incorrect count for your SIM cards by calling the relevant operator and initiating a request for SIM count correction.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for SIM count issues.
How to check SIM count against my CNIC?
What's the way to verify how many SIMs are registered on my CNIC?
How do I find out the number of SIMs issued against my CNIC?
Send an SMS with your CNIC number (without space and dash) to 668; or call our helpline on 345 or UAN 042111345100 for SIM count inquiries.
